post.body:
Hello ZeroMe! Newhere, curious to discover what this new social network has to offer :)

Interested in many many things but several include non-binary gender, gendercute, philosophy, GNU/Linux, Mathematics, Japan, Videogames, studies and stuff :D

I can't wait to converse with you all !

comment.body:
Apt is not the easiest at all! apt-get install blablabla is too long! pacman -Ss blablabla is better! And personnally, since I'm also using Gentoo (alongside with Arch), I even find it easier to type in emerge blablabla XD

Parabola is really cool! I've used it for four years in courses and it did the job well, fast and had a great feel.
Trisquel and Ubuntu are too heavy for me and gNewSense has not been updated to Jessie... If you go for Windows, you'll regret the fastness you can experiment using GNU/Linux (and especially distros like Arch, Parabola or Gentoo which you can customize to be fast and beautiful)
